title: Dakara Koi to Yobanaide
original_name: だから恋とよばないで
sinopse: At the end of the second semester, a teacher came. Everybody in class quickly opened their hearts for the childlike adult, Jiro-chan. Kokoro knew that Sensei loved me because he asked her for help. However, Fuwa-kun, the one I love, hated Sensei.
